basic_data.name: TruPunch 5000 | TRUMPF
basic_data.additional_name: Processing Material: Steel, Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Cast Iron, Non-ferrous Metals
basic_data.description: Exceptional productivity and process security thanks to a backlash-free drive, enabling extremely fast contour processing and thread forming at high C-axis rotation speeds. Fast punching and marking support process flexibility and efficiency.

main_characteristics.title: Flexible Processing with Size 5 Tools for Active Die
content: Size 5 tools for the active die enable flexible work, both for flanging hole edges and for creating slots. The tools used for this purpose include the bottom-up flanging punch, the slot tool, the card guide tool, and the roller embossing tool.

main_characteristics.title: Efficient Smoothing During the Process
content: Thanks to the integrated straightening function and the appropriate tool, unevenness can be corrected during the punching process, eliminating the need for additional finishing.

main_characteristics.title: Efficient Production with TruTops Boost
content: TruTops Boost, a comprehensive 3D software, enables the design and programming of lasers, punch presses, and laser punching machines. Thanks to numerous automations, routine tasks can be accelerated, and material can be saved through shared job pools. Additionally, the program provides full control over all production orders and optimized workflow management.

main_characteristics.title: Smart Industry 4.0 Solutions from TRUMPF
content: TRUMPF software solutions optimize the production process from the first customer inquiry to the delivery of the finished part. The intelligent combination of software, machines, and services provides comprehensive and customized solutions for the Smart Factory in the Industry 4.0 era.
